name: Purgatory (itch) (ChaoticPlay)
description:
After a car accident, you are dead. Satan visits you and offers you a chance at Paradise if you can - 

1) Locate your Killer

2) Find the clues for Paradise

Easy, right? Not after Satan tosses you between Purgatory and the real world completely out of your control. Maybe you're talking to an NPC and suddenly they are a demon. Need to buy items from the shop? Too bad, it is closed. 

You need to spend your time between the Planes wisely or the 10 minutes time limit is up and you will be going with Satan himself.
